metadata.name: Friendship with the Eagle
metadata.description:
Whatever our little friends that we feed in crowded cities and houses mean to us, the steppes and the eagle are the friends of these people. 

They protect herds of sheep and work for people.
I traveled 7000 km for this photo.  As someone who lives in a big city, it was amazing to see this environment, steppes and lifestyles.

In this collection, I would like to share with you the lives of the Mongolian steppes.

Image Size:  5412 Px X 3608
Make : Canon 5D M2 - 135 mm f2 Lens
Exposure : 1/500 sec, Iso 200, f/11
Resolution : 300 Dpi
Created Date : 2019-06-22
Edition : 1/1
